name: Kick the Rvzzia
description:
Kick the Rvzzia is a tower-defense game made by Ukrainian developer. How to play:
- LMB = Shoot.
- R = Reload.
- To earn money, you have to kill enemies. You need to upgrade your base or build protection! Your mission is to protect your base from rvzzians. With each wave, they become stronger and their army growth. So, to last longer, you got to Beat as much rvzzians as you can and try to do your best to make your base last more waves! Show'em who's the boss.  It's time to take this under control!
